Title: Akelarre
Actors: Silvia Munt, Mary Carrillo, Walter Vidarte, Patxi Bisquert
Plot: 17th C.Navarre, Lord Fermin, helped by an inquisitor, has started a witch hunt. Villagers are arrested and tortured to extract 'confessions'. However, Fermin is using this horror to tarnish Unai, a farmer who opposes his rule of tyranny.
